sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Button, Row, Col, Form, FormGroup, FormLabel, FormControl } from 'react-bootstrap'
import useCategorias from '../hooks/useCategorias'

const Formulario = () => {

    const { categoria } = useCategorias()
    console.log(categoria);

  return (
      <>
       <Form>
            <Row>
                <Col md={6}>
                    <FormGroup className='mb-3'>
                        <FormLabel htmlFor='nombre'>Nombre Bebida</FormLabel>
                        <FormControl
                            type='text'
                            placeholder='Ej: Tequila , Vodka , Etc.'
                            name='nombre'
                            //onChange={}
                            id='nombre'
                        />
                    </FormGroup>
                </Col>

                <Col md={6}>
                <FormGroup className='mb-3'>
                        <FormLabel htmlFor='categoria'>Categoria Bebida</FormLabel>
                        <Form.Select
                            name='categoria'
                            //onChange={}
                            id='categoria'
                        > 
                            <option> -Selecciona Categoria- </option>
                            <option> {} </option>
                        </Form.Select>
                    </FormGroup>
                </Col>
            </Row>
        </Form>
      </>
  )
}

export default Formulario
